text: Leptogenys falcigera, is a species of ant of the subfamily Ponerinae. ==Distribution== Comoros, Guam, Hawaii, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, Palau, Philippines, Madagascar, Mauritius, Sri Lanka. ==References== *Animaldiversity.org *Itis.org *Images at Wikimedia ==External links== * * at antwiki.org *AntKey Category:Ponerinae Category:Hymenoptera of Asia Category:Insects described in 1861
title: Leptogenys falcigera
